locale.name: en_US
locale.message: The public identifier '{$publicIdentifier}' already exists for another object (issue, article, galley or supplementary file). Please choose unique identifiers within your publication.
Send this message to all users associated with this publication ({$count} users)
Send this message to the users associated with this publication who have indicated that they wish to receive updates ({$count} users)
Include the table of contents from this volume:
No items are currently scheduled for this volume.
Are you sure you want to permanently delete this volume?
Title is required for the volume.
Volume identification is required. Please select at least one of the volume identification options.
All articles will be returned to the editing queue and all associated files will be permanently removed. Are you sure you want to remove this volume?
Are you sure you want to publish the new volume?
Are you sure you want to unpublish this published volume?
